column4: /usr/local/lib is not in the library load path by default. You can either alter your make to include the library path or put it in the system library path thus:  echo '/usr/local/lib' > /etc/ld.so.conf.d/locallib.conf; ldconfig
I just checked /etc/ld.so.conf.d/libc.conf and it already contain /usr/local/lib but it don't seems to work
: sorry, my mistake, examples compile and install fine. The problem happens on execution
so when it runs it cannot find the library?
